posts.title: Posts
posts.admin_guide: Click to see more detailed guides on posts page.
admin_guide_description: This page allows admins to review all posts that have been set to 'other'.
This way it's easier to categorize posts and make sure that all posts are labelled correctly.
Posts with categories already defined won't be displayed here.
Approve posts before they become available to the public.
Contact the author of posts to confirm the categories set for the posts.
posts.author: Author
posts.name: Name
posts.price_tooltip: Please input a number greater than 0
posts.date_tooltip: Select a date to see posts from that day
posts.new_offer: I would like to make an offer...
posts.new_request: I would like to make a request...
posts.delete_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete?
posts.delete_confirm_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your post.
posts.postal_code_tooltip: Please format all uppercase and no spaces. Eg: A1A1A1

reports.admin_guide: Click to see more detailed guides on reports page.
admin_guide_description: This page allows admins to see all request/offer items that have been reported by users.
To see detailed information regarding reports, simply click on the specific item in the reports list.
All reports concerning the item will be displayed on the left and those that have been resolved on the right.
Regularly check on items that have been flagged with reports and investigate the issues by accessing the detailed information for the related item posts.
In the worst case, contact the author of posts to resolve the reported issues
reports.reason: Please add your reason for reporting this post.
reports.confirmation: Are you sure you want to mark this as resolved?

users.title: Users
users.admin_guide: Click to see more detailed guides on users page.
admin_guide_description: This page allows admins to see all types of users who have registered to UAEM donations tracker app.
All users have their verification status displayed on the right and admins can see their detailed information by clicking on the user.
Ensure that users registered as organization are confirmed members of the organization they've put and verify them.
Monitor users who have been previously flagged with suspicious reports and deactivate them once their illegal activities have been proven.
To verify unapproved users or deactivate any users reported for suspicious activities, clicking on the user will show their information.
users.name: Name
users.verify_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to verify?
users.activate_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to activate?
users.deactivate_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to deactivate?
